mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CHALLENGE_COMMENT ( COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_WRITER, COMMENT_FILE_URL, REF_BOARD_NO, COMMENT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{commentContent}, #{commentWriter}, #{commentFileUrl}, #{refBoardNo}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT cc.COMMENT_NO AS commentNo, cc.REF_BOARD_NO AS refBoardNo, u.USER_NAME AS commentWriter, cc.COMMENT_CONTENT AS commentContent, cc.COMMENT_DATE AS createDate, cc.COMMENT_FILE_URL AS commentFileUrl, cc.COMMENT_WRITER AS commentWriterNo, cc.IS_DELETED AS isDeleted FROM TB_CHALLENGE_COMMENT cc JOIN TB_USER u ON cc.COMMENT_WRITER = u.USER_NO JOIN TB_CHALLENGE c ON cc.REF_BOARD_NO = c.CHALLENGE_NO WHERE cc.REF_BOARD_NO = #{refBoardNo} ORDER BY cc.COMMENT_DATE DESC
SELECT COMMENT_WRITER FROM TB_CHALLENGE_COMMENT WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CHALLENGE_COMMENT SET COMMENT_CONTENT = #{commentContent}, COMMENT_FILE_URL = #{commentFileUrl} WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
UPDATE TB_CHALLENGE_COMMENT SET IS_DELETED = 'Y' WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
